change.changenote: Section 4 (2) (a) (ii) and (ii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 287/2012, effective September 1, 2013.

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: a board, commission or other body any member of which is appointed by Canada or the government,
a municipality, regional district, regional health board or board of education,
